definition: policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy

sentences.chinese: 我们有什么应对良策吗？

sentences.english: On the list of good policies in social contact, honesty should be at the top.
sentences.chinese: 在社交方面所有的良策之中诚信应列在首位。

sentences.english: Reading in bed is an age-old trick for quickly getting to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 在床上阅读是很久以来促进睡眠的良策。

sentences.english: Multipath data access is a remedy to this issue.
sentences.chinese: 而多路数据访问是解决这一问题的良策。

sentences.english: Doctors knew that nicotine was addictive, and they had ways to treat the addiction.
sentences.chinese: 医生们都知道尼古丁有成瘾性，也有治疗的良策。

sentences.english: But the exigency of the case admitted of no alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 但情况紧急，别无其他良策。

sentences.english: Resection and reconstruction with flaps proved a good method to treat sternal fistulae.
sentences.chinese: 证实切除术和胸大肌辫重建是治疗胸骨廔管的良策。

sentences.english: "Don't fight the People's Bank" says that's the right strategy now.
sentences.chinese: “别和人民银行作对”按说是目前的良策。

sentences.english: There seemed nothing else to dobutsend for the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 似乎别无良策，只好派人请大夫了。

definition: the best policy/the best thing one can do in the circumstances
good medicine/effective prescription/fig. good plan/effective strategy
brocade sack of miracle plans (idiom); bag of tricks/fiendishly cunning masterplan (written out by strategic genius of fiction, and given to the local commander in a brocade bag)
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
to offer advice/to make a suggestion
large scale program of lasting importance/project of paramount importance/to think big/annual national audit
to ponder a solution/to consider (the best move, how to find a way etc)
long-term considerations/to take the long view
